description: Number of rooted trees of nonempty sets with n points. (Each node is a set of 1 or more points.)
links: F. Chapoton, F. Hivert, J.-C. Novelli, A set-operad of formal fractions and dendriform-like sub-operads, arXiv preprint arXiv:1307.0092, 2013
INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 768
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
formula: G.f. satisfies: A(x) = x*exp( Sum_{n>=1} (A(x^n) + x^n)/n ). - _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 19 2005If b(n) is the Euler transform of a(n), then a(n+1) = a(n) + b(n). - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Mar 09 2006
crossrefs: Essentially the same as A029856. Cf. A048802.
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Nov 15 1998
